{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3558686,"name":"SLAB-Mr.Thomas","username":"SLAB-Mr.Thomas","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/slab-mr.thomas/{size}/182153_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-16T22:32:46.649Z","cooked":"

We have a great auton (PathPlanner+Limelight) but failed identically the last 3 matches (but we did win them). We suspect our favorite Reef AprilTag was smacked and moved somehow.

Any ideas of how to identify that‚Äôs actually what‚Äôs happening and compensate or recalibrate with essentially no time to do so?

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":10,"updated_at":"2025-03-16T22:32:46.649Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":253,"readers_count":252,"score":60.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":495825,"topic_slug":"reef-tag-moved-maybe-mitigation-suggestions","display_username":"SLAB-Mr.Thomas","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":24594,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/reef-tag-moved-maybe-mitigation-suggestions/495825/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3558703,"name":"Fletch","username":"Fletch1373","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/fletch1373/{size}/220073_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-16T22:57:06.911Z","cooked":"

You send a student to the question box by the field and mention your suspicion that the field is out of compliance and ask that they verify.

That said, the april tags on the field are all vinyl stickers on 0.25" polycarbonate, and are held on by either 2 or 4 1/4-20 bolts (the ones on the reef are only secured by the top 2 holes). It‚Äôs very unlikely that they moved a noticable amount.

","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":10,"updated_at":"2025-03-16T22:57:06.911Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":226,"readers_count":225,"score":95.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":495825,"topic_slug":"reef-tag-moved-maybe-mitigation-suggestions","display_username":"Fletch","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":3}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":9105,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"3181/3015 Mentor | 213/1373 Alum | CSA/FTAA/Jack-of-all-Trades"},"post_url":"/t/reef-tag-moved-maybe-mitigation-suggestions/495825/2","custom_user_title":"3181/3015 Mentor | 213/1373 Alum | CSA/FTAA/Jack-of-all-Trades","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":3}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":3,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3558707,"name":"John Hascall (he)","username":"john3928","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/john3928/{size}/143275_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-16T23:01:52.485Z","cooked":"

Perhaps it was the reef itself that moved?

","post_number":3,"post_type":1,"posts_count":10,"updated_at":"2025-03-16T23:01:52.485Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":2,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":208,"readers_count":207,"score":96.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":495825,"topic_slug":"reef-tag-moved-maybe-mitigation-suggestions","display_username":"John Hascall (he)","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":9105,"username":"Fletch1373","name":"Fletch","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/fletch1373/{size}/220073_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":3}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":46267,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Opinions expressed are mine only"},"post_url":"/t/reef-tag-moved-maybe-mitigation-suggestions/495825/3","custom_user_title":"Opinions expressed are mine only","reactions":[{"id":"point_up","type":"emoji","count":2},{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":3,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3558744,"name":"","username":"0_gottogo_0","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/0_gottogo_0/{size}/235858_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-16T23:42:19.286Z","cooked":"

The field will always be different somehow in a way that impacts us and compensating for that will always be my worst nightmare.

","post_number":4,"post_type":1,"posts_count":10,"updated_at":"2025-03-16T23:42:19.286Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":179,"readers_count":178,"score":45.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":495825,"topic_slug":"reef-tag-moved-maybe-mitigation-suggestions","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":68826,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"5913 | Programmer"},"post_url":"/t/reef-tag-moved-maybe-mitigation-suggestions/495825/4","custom_user_title":"5913 | Programmer","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3558749,"name":"Dan Katzuv","username":"dan","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/d/eada6e/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-03-16T23:46:45.332Z","cooked":"

Update your pose estimator only with tags placed on the reef of the current alliance you play on. I don‚Äôt know if you can filter other tags directly on the Limelight. Otherwise, you can probably get the tag ID and use it choose weather to use that measurement to update the estimator.

","post_number":5,"post_type":1,"posts_count":10,"updated_at":"2025-03-16T23:47:01.514Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":164,"readers_count":163,"score":52.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":495825,"topic_slug":"reef-tag-moved-maybe-mitigation-suggestions","display_username":"Dan Katzuv","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":32004,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"5987 Software Mentor üáÆüá±"},"post_url":"/t/reef-tag-moved-maybe-mitigation-suggestions/495825/5","custom_user_title":"5987 Software Mentor üáÆüá±","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3558750,"name":"Fletch","username":"Fletch1373","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/fletch1373/{size}/220073_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-16T23:47:02.362Z","cooked":"

Yes that is absolutely possible. Its held down to the carpet by ‚Äúhook and loop tape‚Äù (iykyk) and very heavy, so its more likely the carpet itself stretched unevenly allowing it to move a bit. The response is the same though

","post_number":6,"post_type":1,"posts_count":10,"updated_at":"2025-03-16T23:47:02.362Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":3,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":158,"readers_count":157,"score":31.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":495825,"topic_slug":"reef-tag-moved-maybe-mitigation-suggestions","display_username":"Fletch","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":46267,"username":"john3928","name":"John Hascall (he)","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/john3928/{size}/143275_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":9105,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"3181/3015 Mentor | 213/1373 Alum | CSA/FTAA/Jack-of-all-Trades"},"post_url":"/t/reef-tag-moved-maybe-mitigation-suggestions/495825/6","custom_user_title":"3181/3015 Mentor | 213/1373 Alum | CSA/FTAA/Jack-of-all-Trades","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3558752,"name":"Roger","username":"Roger","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/r/c0e974/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-03-16T23:48:19.917Z","cooked":"

Could be (the Reef itself moving). Was it a very early match that worked, and a much later one that didn‚Äôt work? The entire Reef base is a hexagon metal plate with velcro, attached to the carpets, surrounded by the L1 base pieces, also velcro‚Äôd to the carpet. If there was much pushing by robots the whole structure would move ‚Äì technically, the carpet will stretch in that direction. But like @Fletch1373 says above, not a ‚Äúnoticable amount‚Äù.

The Reef April Tags are recessed in the vertical wall and can‚Äôt slide relative to the wall. If the April Tag moved, the trees move with it. The whole Reef moves with it.

The above scenarios are not impossible, but not likely. Student, Question Box, ask.

","post_number":7,"post_type":1,"posts_count":10,"updated_at":"2025-03-16T23:48:19.917Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":152,"readers_count":151,"score":40.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":495825,"topic_slug":"reef-tag-moved-maybe-mitigation-suggestions","display_username":"Roger","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":5699,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/reef-tag-moved-maybe-mitigation-suggestions/495825/7","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3558760,"name":"Steven Carmain","username":"Steven_Carmain","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/s/f07891/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-03-16T23:59:50.088Z","cooked":"

One mitigation strategy bounced around is instead of having multi camera aiming, switch to single camera pointed at the reef. You don‚Äôt care where the absolute position of the reef is once you are aiming at a branch, you just care where your robot is relative to that branch.

I know we struggled on our home field as our reef moved relative to the processor, and since we had cameras pointed both ways, the robot position was bouncing around 2" off.

The even crazier thing I am seeing, teams are turning off their cameras the last 1m or less to the reef, as the tag accuracy goes down that last little bit. They just position based on wheel odometry to finish the aim. It‚Äôs something we might have accidentally did as we put handles that blocked our vision close, and our accuracy went up. We were going to play with that more the next couple weeks.

","post_number":8,"post_type":1,"posts_count":10,"updated_at":"2025-03-17T00:06:07.474Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":122,"readers_count":121,"score":34.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":495825,"topic_slug":"reef-tag-moved-maybe-mitigation-suggestions","display_username":"Steven Carmain","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":2,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":1737,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Programmer/Drive Coach"},"post_url":"/t/reef-tag-moved-maybe-mitigation-suggestions/495825/8","custom_user_title":"Programmer/Drive Coach","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3558767,"name":"SLAB-Mr.Thomas","username":"SLAB-Mr.Thomas","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/slab-mr.thomas/{size}/182153_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-17T00:06:38.158Z","cooked":"
Roger:

Was it a very early match that worked, and a much later one that didn‚Äôt work?

dan:

tags placed on the reef of the current alliance

Sorry. In my exuberance I wasn‚Äôt clear. We won the last three matches of the competition playing BLUE and thus got the Blue Banner. It was scary frustrating to see the autos fail as we knew we had to scrap up every point we could.

I hadn‚Äôt thought it possible to move the reef. Autos are brittle and we need a more robust technique as questioning the field in the ? box is about the last thing we want to blame considering all the ways a team can fail themselves without blaming the field. Only after three identical bad auto runs do we start to suspect external forces.

","post_number":9,"post_type":1,"posts_count":10,"updated_at":"2025-03-17T00:06:38.158Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":7,"quote_count":2,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":100,"readers_count":99,"score":25.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":495825,"topic_slug":"reef-tag-moved-maybe-mitigation-suggestions","display_username":"SLAB-Mr.Thomas","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":24594,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/reef-tag-moved-maybe-mitigation-suggestions/495825/9","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3558770,"name":"Phil Lopreiato","username":"plnyyanks","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/plnyyanks/{size}/65235_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-17T00:11:21.836Z","cooked":"
SLAB-Mr.Thomas:

Autos are brittle and we need a more robust technique as questioning the field in the ? box is about the last thing we want to blame considering all the ways a team can fail themselves without blaming the field

It is also always totally okay to drop by the question box and give the field staff a heads up that something may be out of compliance, in a way that is polite and helpful and not falling back to blame. They want to know about, and are usually happy to double check measurements when they get a moment. It may not always be a solvable problem (the carpet will always stretch), but it‚Äôs always better to have the conversation
